name: Mercury Fallen
description: Dig, Build & Explore. Manage a group of colonists as they attempt to survive underground on an alien world. Automated machine construction was sent ahead to create the Mercury facility, but something has gone wrong. Your colonists awake to find the facility in ruin.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible card (shader model 3) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 8 GB RAM Additional Notes: 64-bit CPU and OS
